text: Harold Scheraga (October 18, 1921 â€“ August 1, 2020) was an American biophysicist. He was the George W. and Grace L. Todd Professor Emeritus in the chemistry department at Cornell University. He was a key person in protein biophysics and in the study of protein solvation and the hydrophobic effect as it relates to protein folding. He was born in New York City. Scheraga died on August 1, 2020 in Ithaca, New York at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American biologists Category:American physicists Category:Educators from New York City Category:Scientists from New York City
title: Harold Scheraga
